Posts.Content: Hello c26850, Consider changing doctors, look for a female practitioner with experience in biopsies. Don't be worried, it hasn't spread. If the cancer had already spread to other parts of your system, you would have started to feel weak, tired and nauseous. Take heart, you'll be alright! Take care, KOALA Report
Posts.Title: Please help , I’m so scared

Posts.Content: Hi nicci75, Happy to tell you that it is not cancer. Likely irritation due to your bra. Kind Regards, KOALA Report
Posts.Title: Could it be cancer?
